topic.title: History Of Present Illness - conformance rules

section.p: The history of present illness section shall contain a narrative description of the sequence of events preceding the patient's current complaints.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="10164-2" HISTORY OF PRESENT ILLNESS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
